i.name: Void Stone
i.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

q.name: Null Sphere
q.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

w.name: Nether Blade
w.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

e.name: Force Pulse
e.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

r.name: Riftwalk
r.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

i1.blurb: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kassadin''' is permanently {{tip|ghosted}} and takes 15% reduced {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
i1.name: Void Stone

riot.name: Void Stone
riot.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

q1.blurb: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kassadin''' fires an orb of void energy at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|Disrupt|interrupting channeled abilities}}.
The excess energy forms around '''Kassadin''', granting him a {{tip|shield}} that exclusively absorbs {{as|magic damage}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.name: Null Sphere

riot.name: Null Sphere
riot.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
riot.tooltip:
Kassadin fires an orb of void energy that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupts channels.

The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

w1.blurb: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kassadin's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|20|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kassadin's''' next basic attack gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deals increased {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and restores {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}, with the amount quintupled against {{tip|champion|champions}}.
leveling:
{{st|Increased Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|40|65|90|115|140}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|4|5|6|7|8}}% of '''missing''' mana}}|Mana Restored Against Champions|{{as|{{ap|20|25|30|35|40}}% of '''missing''' mana}}}}
w1.name: Nether Blade
notes: * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.

* ''Nether Blade's'' enhanced attack can be avoided if '''Kassadin''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} or if the attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}. The enhanced attack will be consumed and no mana will be gained.
* The ''passive'' damage will affect structures but the ''active'' one will not.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ''active'' damage but not the ''passive'' one.

riot.name: Nether Blade
riot.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage and restore {{ e1 }}% of his missing Mana (increases to {{ e4 }}% against champions).

e1.blurb: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kassadin''' gains a ''Void Energy'' stack each time a nearby champion, including himself, uses an [[Champion ability|ability]], up to 6. At 6 stacks, '''Kassadin''' gains the ability to cast ''Force Pulse''.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kassadin''' emits a pulse of void energy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in a cone in the target direction and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
e1.name: Force Pulse
notes: * [[Toggle|Toggle abilities]] '''do not''' grant any ''Void Energy'' stacks for ''Force Pulse''.

riot.name: Force Pulse
riot.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
riot.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

r1.blurb: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a small delay, '''Kassadin''' {{tip|blinks}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on arrival.
Each subsequent ''Riftwalk'' within 15 seconds doubles its {{as|mana cost}} and increases its damage, stacking up to 4 times.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Damage Per Stack|{{ap|40 to 60 3}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|(+ 1% '''maximum''' mana)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|80+40*4 to 120+60*4 3}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ 6% '''maximum''' mana)}}}}
r1.name: Riftwalk

riot.name: Riftwalk
riot.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
riot.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.
